#summary Support droid4me!
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

You developed an Android application with the droid4me framework, and you want to recommend it to other developers, or just to promote it? You can put one of the droid4me icons on the splashscreen or into the credits screen. Thanks for your support!


= Details =
Download the droid4me small icon:

[http://code.google.com/p/droid4me/downloads/detail?name=droid4me_inside_small.png&can=2&q=#makechanges http://droid4me.googlecode.com/files/droid4me_inside_small.png]

Download the droid4me large icon:

[http://code.google.com/p/droid4me/downloads/detail?name=droid4me_inside_large.png&can=2&q=#makechanges http://droid4me.googlecode.com/files/droid4me_inside_large.png]

However, these two icons are works of authorship. You do not have permission to modify them by any way.
